attributes.action: Regulate beauty, aesthetics, hairdressing, tattooing and piercing industry
attributes.additional_details: The industry needs a governing body that provide a strict ethos to follow like CQC salons clinics and academies seem to not be following the correct procedures will have a time frame to rectify if standards are not met closure will be imminent. A board will send out assessors to check premises treatments and courses being carried out to make sure they are of a high standard.
attributes.background: Regulate this industry to stop poor training resulting in unqualified students going out into industry who are not trained to a high standard to perform these treatments.
